definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 22:10 strife, contention—Ps 80:7 + 9 t.; pl. [[מִדְיׇנִים]] Pr 18:18, [[מִדְ֠וׇנִים]] Pr 18:19 + 7 t.; contracted into [[מְדָנִים]] Pr 6:19, Pr 10:12, [[מִדְ֠נִים]] Pr 6:14; cstr. [[מִדְיְנֵי]] Pr 19:13.

strife, contention, alm. wholly Pr:—Pr 18:19, Pr 23:29, Pr 26:20; also Pr 17:14 (‖[[רִיב]]), Pr 22:10 (‖[[דִּין וְקָלוֹן]]); [[יִשָּׂא]] ´[[מ]] Hb Hab 1:3 contention ariseth (‖[[ריב]]); ´[[שׁלּח מ]] let loose strife Pr 6:14, Pr 16:28; ´[[יְגׇרֶה מ]] he stirreth up strife Pr 15:18, Pr 28:25, Pr 29:22; note esp. [[אִישׁ מִדְוׇ֠נִים]] Pr 26:21 = a contentious, quarrelsome man; oftener ´[[אֵשֶׁת מ]] = a contentious woman Pr 21:9, Pr 25:24, Pr 27:15, cf. [[וׇכָָעַם]] ´[[אשׁת מ]] Pr 21:19.
object of contention Ps 80:7, cf. [[אִישׁ מָדוֹן]] Je 15:10 (‖[[אִישׁ רִיב]]).—On [[מָדוֹן]] 2Sa 21:20 Qr, v. I. [[מִדָּה]] sub [[מדד]]. p. 551
